#include<iostream> 
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long n,a[100000],i,j,s,c,num,t = 1;

	while(1)
	{
		cin>>n;	
		if(n==0)
			break;
		c = 0;
		s = 0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			s = s + a[i];
		}
		num = s/n;
		i = 0;
		j = n-1;
		sort(a,a+n);
		while(i!=j)
		{
			if(abs(a[i]-num)>abs(a[j]-num))	
			{
				c = c + abs(a[j]-num);
				a[i] = a[i] + abs(a[j]-num);
				a[j] = num;
				j--;
			}
			else
			{
				c = c + abs(a[i]-num);
				a[j] = a[j] - abs(a[i]-num);
				a[i] = num;
				i++;
			}
		}
		cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl;
		cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<c<<"."<<endl;
		cout<<endl;
		t++;
	}
	return 0;
}
